name: Vegan Flan
description: Flan, silky creamy delicious vegan flan. This custard-like creation is one of the most recognized desserts in all of Latin America and my absolute favorite!!

video.name: Vegan Flan
video.description: The perfect vegan flan, silky, creamy, and smooth.

recipeInstructions.text: Pour sugar into a medium sauce pot and set to medium-low heat. Let the sugar dissolve, gently swirling the pot but not stirring, until mixture turns a deep golden color, 8 to 9 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: Pour sugar into a medium sauce pot and set to medium-low heat. Let the sugar dissolve, gently swirling the pot but not stirring, until mixture turns a deep golden color, 8 to 9 minutes.

recipeInstructions.text: Immediately remove pot from heat and pour caramel into ramekins. Gently lift and tilt ramekins to coat the inside with caramel. Set aside.
recipeInstructions.name: Immediately remove pot from heat and pour caramel into ramekins. Gently lift and tilt ramekins to coat the inside with caramel. Set aside.

recipeInstructions.text: Combine coconut milk and agar agar in a medium sauce pot.
recipeInstructions.name: Combine coconut milk and agar agar in a medium sauce pot.

recipeInstructions.text: In the blender combine the oatmilk, sugar, chickpea flour, and vanilla. Process until smooth. Pour this mixture into the pot with the coconut milk.
recipeInstructions.name: In the blender combine the oatmilk, sugar, chickpea flour, and vanilla. Process until smooth. Pour this mixture into the pot with the coconut milk.

recipeInstructions.text: Bring mixture to a simmer for 5 minutes, then remove from the heat. Let cool slightly, then pour into ramekins.
recipeInstructions.name: Bring mixture to a simmer for 5 minutes, then remove from the heat. Let cool slightly, then pour into ramekins.

recipeInstructions.text: Place ramekins in the fridge for 4 hours to let the flan set.
recipeInstructions.name: Place ramekins in the fridge for 4 hours to let the flan set.

recipeInstructions.text: To serve, place bottom of ramekin in a container with hot water for 1 -2 minutes, in order to release the flan.
recipeInstructions.name: To serve, place bottom of ramekin in a container with hot water for 1 -2 minutes, in order to release the flan.

recipeInstructions.text: Use a small knife or offset spatula to carefully loosen the edges of the flan. Turn flan over onto a plate, shake gently to release flan and remove ramekin.
recipeInstructions.name: Use a small knife or offset spatula to carefully loosen the edges of the flan. Turn flan over onto a plate, shake gently to release flan and remove ramekin.

keywords: caramel, coconut milk, oat milk, vegan custard
